item.title: Cracking With Hashcat in the Cloud
item.author: hello@eiken.dev (eikendev)
item.description: Thanks to the global chip shortage, for about two years certain electronic items are really hard to buy. This includes graphics cards, those things that make your display useful. They’re also beasts at cracking password hashes. Admittedly, I waited for the situation to resolve so I can buy a graphics card for a sane price and improve my hashcat experience, but I now think this is unlikely to happen anytime soon. Time to find a modern solution.
